feed.title: Montreal River Harbour - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WARNING , Montreal River Harbour
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:10 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -15.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wawa Airport 4:00 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -15.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.3 kPa falling
Visibility: 11.3 km
Humidity: 72 %
Wind Chill: -20
Dewpoint: -19.7°C
Wind: SW 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Flurries or snow squalls. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Flurries and local snow squalls. Blowing snow. Local amount 15 to 25 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 26 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A few flurries or snow squalls. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Flurries. A few local snow squalls early in the morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 10. Wind chill near minus 21. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few flurries. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 14. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of flurries. High minus 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 11. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Local blowing snow. Windy. High minus 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023
